mapper.select: select img, sn_num, subject, TO_CHAR(input_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') input_date from (select s.s_num, ut.img from study s, user_table ut where s_num=#{ sNum } AND s.id = ut.id) ss, study_notice sn where sn.s_num = #{ sNum } order by sn.input_date desc

select sn.subject, sn.content , sn.meeting_info, sn.addr, to_char(sn.input_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') input_date, ut.nick, ut.img from study_notice sn, study s, user_table ut where sn.sn_num=#{snNum} and s.s_num=sn.s_num and s.id=ut.id order by s.input_date desc
SELECT s.study_name FROM study s, study_notice sn WHERE sn.sn_num = #{ sn_num } AND sn.s_num = s.s_num
select hw.id, hw.workload, hw.finish_flag, ut.nick from homework hw, user_table ut where sn_num=#{snNum} and hw.id = ut.id
select sc.sn_comment, TO_CHAR(sc.input_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') input_date, ut.nick from sn_comment sc, user_table ut where sc.id= ut.id and sn_num=#{snNum} order by sc.input_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study_notice(sn_num, s_num, subject, meeting_info, content, addr) VALUES(sn_code, #{ s_num }, #{ subject } , #{ meeting_info }, #{ content }, #{ addr })
mapper.select: SELECT sn_num FROM(SELECT sn_num FROM study_notice WHERE s_num = #{ s_num } ORDER BY input_date DESC) WHERE rownum=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO homework(id, workload, sn_num) VALUES(#{ id }, #{ workload }, #{ sn_num })
INSERT INTO alarm(a_num, category, subject, content, id) VALUES(a_code, #{ category }, #{ subject }, #{ content }, #{ id })
insert into SN_COMMENT (SN_NUM, SN_COMMENT, ID) values(#{ snNum },#{ snComment },#{ id })
mapper.select: SELECT nick, m.id FROM user_table u, member m WHERE m.s_num=#{ id } AND m.id = u.id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM homework WHERE sn_num=#{ sn_num }
